caption: Absolutely amazing experience with our sommelier Irvin!!! He was very passionate, funny and his explanations were very comprehensive, learned a lot:) beautiful, elegant location and of course, great wine. Must do activity while in Paris!

We were extremely happy with our wine tasting tour. We learned so much about the making and tasting of wine in just 1h and our guide Erwin was absolutely fantastic! He was very kind, attentive and knowledgeable. The place itself was also very beautiful and the wines were of course amazing. Would this recommend to anyone who loves wine!

Our group did the wine blending workshop and it was really fun for everyone. The tasting was very thorough and interactive, giving a good foundation for creating our own blends. The instructor was very friendly and knowledgeable.  I really loved that we got to make our own labels, and wax the bottles we made. This made for excellent souvenirs!

We had an amazing wine/cheese tasting with a wonderful Irvin, who explained about the history, harvesting and taste of the wines and cheeses in a nice joyful manner which was very relaxing and enjoyable.
Loved our afternoon here! We got to speak with a very knowledgeable sommelier and tried some great wines.

Amazing place -- absolute must when visoring Paris, to experience, learn about, and taste the French wine! It was the souce of winw for the royalties, before the time of the Louvre, the museu, when it was a palace! Our sommelier Irwin was great in teaching us with very interesting stories and apt explanations. He even gave us an extra drink to experience an example of sweeter French wines!  Just see the  attached pictures, each of which represents the key elements of (French) wine - source/land/region, smell, texture, ...  Really a must beyond the "prime" tourist elements of Paris!

The classic wine tour was very informative, interactive, interesting and so much fun. The caves were beautiful and Irwin, our sommelier, was brilliant. Highly recommend this wine tour to anybody visiting Paris.

We had a wonderful wine tasting experience here, led by Morgan. He was incredibly knowledgeable and passionate about the wines, making our entire visit truly special.  We participated as part of a group, and thoroughly enjoyed it. We loved all three wines included in our package, and the setting of the tour was simply amazing. Thank you again for a fantastic time!

We had a lovely tour here on a Tuesday in mid August. A small group allowed for lots of questions and time in each part of the tour. The guide was excellent - knowledgeable, friendly and helpful. All of the wines we tasted were great. Overall a really great experience and I would recommend it to anyone.

My wife and I went on a wine tasting tour here and it was great. The instructor was very informative about the different regions of France and how they grow and make the wine. We got to try multiple different blends and you can purchase those at the end of the tour or buy a different wine. Highly recommend to anyone in the area.

Walked into this shop by chance with a friend. We were impressed by their enthusiasm, warmth and knowledge.  I find them very approachable and not pushy.  In fact, we bought two bottles of wine right away and even signed up for the wine and cheese tasting session.  The wine and cheese tasting was very well conducted. The curator again was very impressive with his knowledge. He also shared many stories behind the wine and cheese. The tasting was conducted in a cellar beneath the shop which adds authenticity to the entire experience.  I find the two hours very well spent.  One particular mention is the interaction between the participants. Our group of French, Italian, American and Singaporeans were very active in sharing our own experiences. Of course, much were encouraged by our wonderful curator and sommelier.  A super wonderful experience which I would readily recommend anyone visiting Paris. üëçüèªüíñüç∑

Irvin was such a wonderful host and so incredibly knowledgeable! He made the whole event interesting, informative and fun. The wine and cheese pairing was fantastic and introduced such new combinations - we‚Äôve come away with so many bottles of wine and cheeses to bring home! We will definitely be coming back.

We took the classic tour in English and had the most wonderful time, the place is beautiful, the tour is interesting and obviously tasty. But the best part of our tour was our guide Theo, who was so knowledgeable and nice and we had a lot of fun together!! A must do on your trip to Paris!

The guided tour was brilliant. Got to learn so many things about wine, how it's made, how it's stored, the difference between the corks and how they change the wine taste with the passing of time, how to choose wine for different occasions... The best part: got three different wine tastes and they were all lovely üç∑üç∑üç∑ ‚Ä¶

Les Caves du Louvre is a hidden gem in Paris! The wine selection was absolutely amazing, each sip better than the last. The only disappointment was watching others spit out the wine instead of drinking it. Such a waste of liquid gold!

Great tour. Paid around ¬£30 for the 60minute experience and I feel was great value for money. The host was very informative and accommodating. Learnt a lot and had a lot of fun. I would recommend. Even got a bottle of wine from the wine shop at the end which was a stunning sweet wine.

We had an awesome time at the winetasting! It was a fun, interactive experience where we learned a lot about not only wine, but also the regions in France, the different soils and grapes! There was enough time to ask questions and our guide Marie answered all of them with passion and knowledge. Her English was great and it is safe to say she made the experience! I would recommend this to everyone who likes wine because you get good wines and you learn about the different aromas, which is fun for all!

Amazing experience! You take a tour in the wine cellar, and go to beautifully decorated rooms. The instructor was super nice and informative. We've been to many wine tastings before but this was extra special.

What a find!   Outstanding experience in sellers where the king of France used to store his wine.  Great shop as well if you're looking for French wines you just wouldn't see back home.  Book a tasting tour!   You won't be disappointed.

This was a surprise highlight of our time in Paris! Loved tasting the wines (we did the premium tasting which we'd recommend) and hearing the history of the Caves. The smelling stations were also fun and informative! Check out the cheese shop next door too to complete your afternoon!

My visit to Les Caves du Louvre in Paris was absolutely incredible and definitely a highlight of my trip. This wine cellar is like no other, offering an immersive journey into the world of French wine. It's a perfect blend of education, interactivity, and pure enjoyment that you won't find anywhere else.  The workshop and guided tour provided a comprehensive understanding of the wine-making process, delving into how weather and geology affect the taste of wine. The amount of information presented was seriously impressive, even for someone like me who already knows a bit about wine.  What really stood out about Les Caves du Louvre was their innovative approach to exploring wine. The core samples of different terroirs were mind-blowing, giving you a tangible experience of how the environment shapes the character of a wine. And let's not forget the smelling room with its fun smell quiz game ‚Äì it was a unique and engaging way to learn about wine aromas. I loved how interactive it was!  Throughout the tour, you could tell that the sommelier was incredibly knowledgeable and passionate about French wine. They really made the experience educational and entertaining at the same time. The app they provided was also super helpful, giving you even more information and a personalized touch to the tour.  Les Caves du Louvre is more than just a wine tasting, it's an educational adventure that gives you a deeper appreciation for French wine. Whether you're a wine enthusiast or just curious, I highly recommend adding this experience to your list when you're in Paris. With their expert knowledge, interactive elements, and amazing cuv√©e, it'll be a memorable experience you won't forget.

This is a very educational and cool experience that you can get with your Paris Pass. If you‚Äôre thinking about booking this, I suggest you do as you learn a lot about French wine, and you get 3 free glasses, so why not?  The location itself is incredible! There are so many little rooms underground and history behind the location that just going through it is such a cool experience.  There are a few interactive things to do as well, also, it‚Äôs a nice way to beat the heat and have a refreshing drink.  They‚Äôre also connected to their own store so you can pick up a couple of bottles of fine wine after your tour.  Definitely check it out if you have a chance.
Irvin our sommelier was incredible on the wine tasting tour! We learned a lot and got to taste really good wine. Highly recommend to anyone visiting Paris, the place is also very beautiful inside.
The winery tour was very interesting, with a great atmosphere and delicious wine.

Great place to learn a few things about french wine. We went for a tour and tasted 3 wines, the guide was very friendly, informative‚Ä¶ The journey is super fun we event had an activity. We might go back to try the cheese tasting.  So to summarise the tour is made for people who like wine and want to learn a thing or 2 about french wine & definitely not for someone who‚Äôs a wine expert.
Incredible place with a great story and environment. It was a well done wine tasting. I will return!

A must do in Paris! Wine & Cheese tasting! Great experience, the place is beautiful and you get to of course learn a lot about wine and cheese! The Somelier was fun and turned the experience from delicious to fun (the wine contributed a lot too). I highly recommend it!
Great experience! Our tour guide attended Uni in America! He was very engaging! Interactive exhibits were a lot of fun. Explanation of French wine was enlightening. Good wine!

We did a wine tour here, the girls on reception were excellent and very helpful. Our guide had a knowledge of wine and history that was beyond belief, I went along as my partner wanted to do this but in all honesty it was brilliant and I could of stayed there all day listening to the history and process of wine making in France. Highly recommend.

Great experience for adults (kids, not so much)!  It was very nicely decorated, and very clean feeling.  There was plenty to learn and experience for all the physical senses.  Wine was poured generously for three separate tastings by an experienced sommelier.  And, if you take the self-guided tour, they offer a free bottle of great-tasting wine, per person, of your choosing!

This was apart of our paris pass and it was so worth it. Learned a lot about their wines and region. Def would do again! The gentleman who gave us the tour was not very personal but very very knowledgeable! The wine was good. I would say better than our wine tour in Tuscany. He also made recommendations of other wines in their wine store and both bottles we bought were delicious!!!!

Fantastic place for wine tasting! Very knowledgeable sommelier! They also had non alcoholic grape juices for little ones from the same grapes the wines were made from. I will definitely come back for their more high end wine tasting in future.

Pretty interesting place for wine tasting and its history as it's in a cave underneath in the middle of Paris.  The tour was pretty straightforward and interactive. If you like wine and have some free time you can opt for it. However, without it I don't think I'm missing out.

We had Theo for a wine tasting and tour.  The tour was interactive allowing for a variety of questions and dialogue.  Theo was extremely knowledgeable and passionate about his job.  He explained the characteristics of various French wines/regions along with factors which play into the difference in taste.   Highly recommend Theo if you want a knowledge/friendly tour guide.

My Fianc√© and I really enjoyed this self guided tour and wine tasting. The waiter at the end for our wine tasting of 3 different varieties was great and we learned so much. We definitely appreciate wine a lot more now and look forward to using our new skills in tasting more in the future! Thank you for a lovely experience as part of our GoCity pass. üòÑüë©‚Äç‚ù§Ô∏è‚Äçüë®üç∑üçæ
Had an incredible experience ,all  thanks to Irvin! The wine was exceptional. Irvin‚Äôs knowledge and recommendation were spot on. Highly recommend, top-notch service!

Their wine tasting tour is excellent. The sommelier is very knowledgeable and explains about the different soils, vine growing methods, smells, all while trying different wines. He shows the proper way to taste the wine as well. Recommend trying both the regular and premium wines
Highly recommend their wine tasting sessions. The guide was extremely knowledgeable. Learned a lot about wine, how it's made, and the differences between the different winemaking regions.
